page.title: 14DUNDONALD AREA _ HOUSING
page.content: Around the village of Dundonald there are many farms and also a few small_holdings. These small_holdings were built after the First World War to provide work for soldiers returning home from the war. Each house stands in an acre of land and has a large barn at the side. Some of the small_holdings have been converted into very pleasant modern homes with extensions and other improvements made.Many of them are still run as small businesses. In the village itself, there are more modern,privately_owned houses which were built in the 1960's in the grounds of the Old Auchans Estate. These houses are mostly quite big and have large gardens and lots of mature trees. All the houses have garages and lots of them have extra rooms built on.
